title: RCS to sms
content: so i cant seem to find the retry as sms on the chat setting in messages , i have done the usual uninstalled it, restarted phone etc yet this option is not there anymore , my wife sent me a chat message both of have enabled chat  , i didnt have a data connection wifi/4g , i didn't receive this chat message until got back home and connected to wifi, i am sure previously i would have got a sms ?
